Package app

Class RawDataProcessingService

java.lang.Object
service.RawDataProcessingService
public class RawDataProcessingService extends Object
Service class responsible for orchestrating the processing of raw sensor data through a configurable pipeline of RawDataFilters and persisting valid results into the clean data repository.

This class implements the core logic of a Pipe-and-Filter architecture: it retrieves all entries from the RawDataRepository, applies a sequence of transformations/validations via the filter chain, and if successful, stores the result in the CleanDataRepository.

Data that fails any filter in the chain is discarded, and an explanatory message is printed to standard output.

This design allows for flexible addition or removal of filters, enabling the processing logic to be easily extended or reused.


 RawDataProcessingService service = new RawDataProcessingService(rawRepo, cleanRepo, filters);
 service.processAll();

  • Constructor Details

    • RawDataProcessingService

      public RawDataProcessingService(RawDataRepository rawRepo, CleanDataRepository cleanRepo, List<RawDataFilter> filters)
      Constructs a new RawDataProcessingService with the required repositories and filter chain.
      Parameters:
      rawRepo - the repository from which raw data will be retrieved
      cleanRepo - the repository into which valid processed data will be persisted
      filters - the list of filters to apply in sequence to each raw record

  • Method Details

    • processAll

      public void processAll()
      Processes all raw records in the RawDataRepository:
      • Applies each configured filter in order
      • Persists valid results as CleanData
      • Prints success or discard messages for each record

      If any filter throws an exception, the current raw record is discarded.

    • applyFilters

      private RawData applyFilters(RawData input) throws Exception
      Applies the entire filter chain to the given RawData input.
      Parameters:
      input - the raw data record to process
      Returns:
      the filtered and potentially transformed raw data
      Throws:
      Exception - if any filter in the chain rejects the data
